title: Error Creation New Folder (MSSQL Mode)
author: atscripter
body_snippet:
I was successfully able to connect to an MSSQL database but I get an SQL related [error](https://i.imgur.com/iE1ubOP.png) when attempting to create new a "connection" folder.

Running v1.77.1 (portable) on Windows 10 Enterprise 10.0.18363 Build 18363.

iterations.description: SQL NOT NULL constraint violation on 'RedirectAudioCapture' when saving a new folder — DataTableSerializer omits default values for RDP-specific columns on ContainerInfo nodes.

notes:
AI triage (claude): SQL NOT NULL constraint violation on 'RedirectAudioCapture' when saving a new folder — DataTableSerializer omits default values for RDP-specific columns on ContainerInfo nodes.
Approach: In SerializeConnectionInfo(), ensure all NOT NULL columns (RedirectAudioCapture and similar RDP boolean columns) receive a default value (false/empty string) when the node is a ContainerInfo, either via DBNull.Value handling in CreateSchema() or by explicitly setting defaults before INSERT.
